alert.note: Alert for Central Cook; Northern Cook (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Beach Hazards Statement issued September 08 at 2:56PM CDT until September 09 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...BEACH HAZARDS STATEMENT REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM CDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...High wave action and dangerous currents expected at Lake Michigan beaches. Waves to 6 ft expected. * WHERE...Northern Cook and Central Cook Counties. * WHEN...Until 1 AM CDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Swimming conditions will be life threatening, especially for inexperienced swimmers. For information on swim advisories or bans at Chicago beaches: www. cpdbeaches. com.
info.instruction: Remain out of the water to avoid dangerous swimming conditions and do not venture out onto piers, jetties, breakwalls, or other shoreline structures.
